product_name: Salomon Divine Origins Downhill Ski Poles - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built with elegant good looks, the Salomon Divine Origins downhill ski poles are lightweight, durable aluminum poles with ergonomic grips designed to comfortably fit a woman's hand. Grip and strap comfortably support hands and wrists. Constructed from light yet durable aluminum. Standard baskets are suitable for hard snow. Closeout.
short_description: Built with elegant good looks, the Salomon Divine Origins downhill ski poles are lightweight, durable aluminum poles with ergonomic grips designed to comfortably fit a woman's hand.
